LanguageData.IdeoligionTips.tips.SlaveWorkEfficiency: Slaves work slower than normal colonists due to lack of motivation.
LanguageData.IdeoligionTips.tips.TerrorRadius: Terror-inducing buildings affect anyone within a 5-cell radius.
LanguageData.IdeoligionTips.tips.SleepAcceleratorNaps: Sleep accelerators increase colonists' sleep quality, but also increase hunger rate. Consider assigning them more frequent, short naps to prevent starvation during sleep.
